revised_title: Blue-Green Algae and Nitrogen Fixation in Rice Fields
tldr: The author investigates the role of blue-green algae in nitrogen fixation in rice fields. They find that blue-green algae, specifically Anabaena and Phormidium species, play a significant role in nitrogen fixation in waterlogged rice fields. This discovery could have implications for sustainable agriculture and improving soil fertility in rice cultivation.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Soil Microbiology
